targets.query:
from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "size" or r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _time: r._time,
            _measurement: r._measurement,
            _field: "pool_used_percent",
            _value: float(v: r.alloc) / float(v: r.size) * 100.0
        }),
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fragmentation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root/raidz-0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.uptime.uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sda.busy" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sdb.busy" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sdc.busy" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sdd.busy" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sde.busy" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sdf.busy" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk_busy.sdg.busy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.zfs.hits.hits" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.zfs.hits.misses")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.load.load1" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.load.load5" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.load.load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.net.eno3.received" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.net.eno3.sent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.zfs.arc_size.arcsz" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.ram.free" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.mem.committed.Committed_AS")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.cpu.nice" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.cpu.guest" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.cpu.system" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.system.cpu.user")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.ZDHBC2CH.ZDHBC2CH" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.ZDHBCD6Y.ZDHBCD6Y" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.ZDHBCJEL.ZDHBCJEL" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.ZDHBCKH5.ZDHBCKH5" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.ZDHBDJS1.ZDHBDJS1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.S1ATNSAD906882M.S1ATNSAD906882M" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.smart_log_smart.disktemp.S21TNXAG607043P.S21TNXAG607043P")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.cputemp.temperatures.0" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.cputemp.temperatures.1" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.cputemp.temperatures.2" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.cputemp.temperatures.3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sda.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sda.writes" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdb.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdb.writes" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdc.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdc.writes" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdd.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdd.writes" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sde.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sde.writes" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdf.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdf.writes" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdg.reads" or r["_measurement"] == "scale.truenas.disk.sdg.writes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "truenas-telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "zpool_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "size" or r["_field"] == "alloc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "ONLINE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "truenas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vdev"] == "root")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(
        fn: (r) => ({
            _time: r._time,
            _measurement: r._measurement,
            _field: "pool_used_percent",
            _value: float(v: r.alloc) / float(v: r.size) * 100.0
        }),
    )
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
